name: Clutch - OSG
description:
NOTICE: This game is a part of IEP Legacy games; it is very old, buggy and its development is canceled. For newer games, please visit my main page. About

For a new comer, getting helped by the leader of city is such a delight, but you won't waste his support. Instead you work hard, enter races, upgrade your car and take on missions until you become another legend just like him.

Important notes for those who want to download:
  • Development of this game is canceled. Please don't report any bugs since it won't be updated.
  • This game might crash on load and drop a crash.dmp file on some computers.
  • This project is not open source anymore for obvious reasons.
